getNewAndUpdatedObjectsPolling.title: Get New and Updated Objects Polling

help.description: Poll for new and/or updated objects

objectType.label: Object Type
objectType.prompt: Please select the type of object to poll on

startTime.label: Start Time
startTime.note: Beginning time to start polling from (inclusive) in format "YYYY-MM-DD[T]HH:MM:SS[Z]" where [] wraps a fixed character value. Defaults to 1970-01-01T00:00:00.000Z

endTime.label: End Time
endTime.note: End time to stop polling at (inclusive) in format "YYYY-MM-DD[T]HH:MM:SS[Z]" where [] wraps a fixed character value. Defaults to never

pollConfig.label: Time stamp field to poll on
pollConfig.prompt: Please select a Time stamp field to poll on. Default: Last Modified

help.description: Manually construct a request to send to the server.
